siteMetadata.title: Apple Tips and Tricks
siteMetadata.description: A collection of tips and tricks for people who are using Apple products and ecosystem.

markdownRemark.html:
Force touching on a key of the keyboard allows you to move the cursor to any place within the input field.

The same principle works on iPadOS too.
